await nitrovest.store(5)
const nitrovest = await NitroVest.attach('0xCF8f7fdBFef2549D5ea981aaCa586068Be89756B');
const  NitroVest = await ethers.getContractFactory('NitroVest');
await nitrovest.store(5)
await box.store(5)

const  NitroVest = await ethers.getContractFactory('NitroVest');
